SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VM Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cloud Service Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Command" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "VM_STATE"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN# ,string :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# ,string
!Check for action shutdown ! :IF &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# = "SHUTDOWN_DEALLOCATE_VM" ! : SET &UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN# = "StoppedDeallocated" ! : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "SHUTDOWN" ! :ENDIF
! :IF &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# = "SHUTDOWN_VM"
! :ENDIF
! :IF &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# = "START_VM" ! : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "START" ! :ENDIF
! :IF &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# = "RESTART_VM" ! : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "RESTART" ! :ENDIF
:SWITCH &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# : CASE "SHUTDOWN_DEALLOCATE_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN# = "StoppedDeallocated" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "SHUTDOWN"
: CASE "SHUTDOWN_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN# = "Stopped" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "SHUTDOWN"
: CASE "START_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "START"
: CASE "RESTART_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "RESTART" :ENDSWITCH
! define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 30
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-connectiontimeout" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-readtimeout" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_READ_TIMEOUT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-subscriptionId" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[9] = "-keystore" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[11] = "-password" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CERT_PSWD#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[13] = "-rolename" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[15] = "-servicename" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[16] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[17] = "-deploymentname" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[18] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[19] = "-xmsversion" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "2013-06-01" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[20] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[21] = "-vmoperation" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[22] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
:IF &UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[23] = "-postshutdown" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = "&UC4RB_AZR_POST_SHUTDOWN#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.EDIT_OPTION_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[24] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** START_STOP_RESTART ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** START_STOP_RESTART ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1)
: SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AZR_REQUEST_ID#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
